name: Salesforce/xlam-function-calling-60k
description: The Salesforce/xlam-function-calling-60k dataset is a comprehensive collection of 60,000 data points, generated by APIGen, an automated data generation pipeline. This pipeline is designed to produce high-quality datasets for function-calling applications, ensuring their reliability and correctness through three hierarchical stages: format checking, actual function executions, and semantic verification. The dataset was evaluated by humans over 600 sampled data points, and more information about the evaluation can be found on the dataset's page at https://huggingface.co/datasets/Salesforce/xlam-function-calling-60k. This dataset is a valuable resource for researchers and developers working on function-calling applications.
citeAs: @article{liu2024apigen,   title={APIGen: Automated Pipeline for Generating Verifiable and Diverse Function-Calling Datasets},   author={Liu, Zuxin and Hoang, Thai and Zhang, Jianguo and Zhu, Ming and Lan, Tian and Kokane, Shirley and Tan, Juntao and Yao, Weiran and Liu, Zhiwei and Feng, Yihao and others},   journal={arXiv preprint arXiv:2406.18518},   year={2024} }
creator: Salesforce
keywords: function-calling, LLM, Agent, code, Synthetic, Automated Data Generation
